channel.title: Portforwarding!
channel.description:
Hello guys, I've been using servers for quite awhile now.. and suddenly i got a new router for Linksys, (My Other One Shit Out) Anyway, i've tried starting my servers again, and I CANT! because my portforwarding just won't work. My ports will not open, no matter what I do.. If anyone knows some kinds of things that will help me be able to fix this, or have T.V And can help PLEASE! let me know.. I really need some help..
Thanks guys

item.title: Portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @Bonjour Bonjour
item.description:
@Bonjour wrote:

ah, yeah i checked, not sure if mines the same as yours with linksys, i unchecked one just like what you said, and still cant open the port…

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

did you uncheck block anonymous internet requests? in security.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

[quote=“Bonjour, post:3, topic:378221”]Err! I know HOW to portforward, I’ve done everything, the ports won’t open, there has to be something stoping it… Any ideas what it can be?![/quote]Go into your cmd type ipconfig whatever the last digit of the IPv4 example: 192.168.2.3 change that in your portforwarding thing to the last digit again. sometimes the IPv4 ip changes.

Read full topic
